item.title: Please help me ! ! ! ##$%&
item.dc:creator: @MoparRocksScape MoparRocksScape
item.description:
@MoparRocksScape wrote:

lolwtfbbqhax:

wrong section.

No it isn’t lol…

Okay so after you downloaded the source look in the folders and click on Runserver.bat. Now it should say something like it is starting or it should have a Port Number. Enter your IP Number and the port number that it says into the MoparScape Client. Now all you have to do is set your player rights to 3 in the Characters Folder. If you have any errors with the Runserver.bat or Compiler please visit my guide and it will explain it all: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,112844.msg1143853.html#msg1143853

Read full topic
